name: One Thirsty Bird And One Hungry Totem
name_original: One Thirsty Bird And One Hungry Totem
description:
One Thirsty Bird And One Hungry Totem is a game developed by Ben Sulzinsky. It came out on 11-04-2021.
You can play One Thirsty Bird And One Hungry Totem on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
